text: Ben Caplan is a Canadian folk musician from Halifax, Nova Scotia. He often performs with his band The Casual Smokers, and his first full-length studio album, In the Time of the Great Remembering, was released on October 20, 2011.Ben Caplan & The Casual Smokers – In The Time Of The Great Remembering | Album Reviews | musicOMH His second record, Birds With Broken Wings, was released September 18, 2015.Birds With Broken Wings. Exclaim!. ==Career== ===Early years=== Ben Caplan was born and raised in Hamilton, Ontario and now resides in Halifax, Nova Scotia.(January 23, 2013). Singer-songwriter Ben Caplan’s old soul. CBC News. Retrieved March 20, 2015. He began writing music at the age of 13 with friends, but it was at the age of 19 that he started his journey as an independent singer-songwriter.An Interview With Ben Caplan Taken by Soul. Retrieved March 26, 2015. Although he studied at the University of King's College, he decided that in order to have a career in music, it would have to become his priority.BAND STRIKES ROOTSY CHORD - Ben Caplan & The Casual Smokers More Than Just a Party Band The Dalhousie Gazette. Retrieved March 26, 2015. He participated in the Artist Entrepreneur program through Coalition Music (Canada’s Music Incubator) which helps emerging artists build their careers, businesses, and brands.COALITION MUSIC (Toronto’s Music Incubator) – Artist Entrepreneur Program Music Ontario. Retrieved March 26, 2015 Caplan performed live at the 2013 Byron Bay Bluesfest that took place from March 30 to April 1.Archive 2013 Byron Bay Bluesfest. Retrieved March 20, 2015. From April to the end of July in 2013, Caplan played a number of shows that spread across Australia, the Netherlands, Germany, Switzerland, Poland, Norway, United Kingdom,and in Canada. Among these shows, he performed at Glastonbury Festival (UK), The Hop Farm Festival (UK), and Roots In The Park Music Festival (Netherlands). In December 2013, Caplan returned to the Netherlands for a weekend tour that consisted of dates in Tilburg, Arnhem, and Haarlem.Netherlands Tour: December 2013 Youtube. Retrieved March 20, 2015. From December 28, 2013 to January 10, 2014, Caplan played a series of shows in Australia and participated in the Woodford Folk Festival and Sydney Festival.The AU Interview: Ben Caplan (Canada) Talks 2014 Tour! The AU Review. Retrieved March 26, 2015 From February 21 to April 1, 2015, Caplan toured the United States for the first time.
